verbs.description: The president ’s former lawyer [V: has] leaked word that he ’s willing to give investigators information on Trump – and that he wants the president to pay his legal bills .
[ARG0: The president ’s former lawyer] has [V: leaked] [ARG1: word that he ’s willing to give investigators information on Trump – and that he wants the president to pay his legal bills] .
The president ’s former lawyer has leaked word that [ARG1: he] [V: ’s] [ARG2: willing to give investigators information on Trump] – and that he wants the president to pay his legal bills .
The president ’s former lawyer has leaked word that [ARG0: he] ’s willing to [V: give] [ARG2: investigators] [ARG1: information on Trump] – and that he wants the president to pay his legal bills .
The president ’s former lawyer has leaked word that he ’s willing to give investigators information on Trump – and that [ARG0: he] [V: wants] [ARG1: the president to pay his legal bills] .
The president ’s former lawyer has leaked word that he ’s willing to give investigators information on Trump – and that he wants [ARG0: the president] to [V: pay] [ARG1: his legal bills] .
